articles.title: People With Chronic Conditions Share How Selma Blair’s Exit From “DWTS” Made Them Feel - BuzzFeed News
articles.description: Blair, who has multiple sclerosis, “pushed as far as [she] could” but ultimately had to leave the competition to protect her health, she said.
